description: This chicken parmigiana recipe is a lighter version of everyone's favourite pub classic. The chicken is baked, not fried - give it a try today.
keywords: Chicken Parmigiana With Rocket & Capsicum Salad
name: Chicken Parmigiana With Rocket & Capsicum Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.5 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, place rocket, capsicum, vinegar, and remaining basil and oil in a large bowl and toss to combine. Season with pepper. Divide chicken parmigiana and rocket salad among plates. Serve.
